name: Catch Off-Guard
text: Foes are surprised by your skilled use of unorthodox and improvised weapons.
benefit: You do not suffer any penalties for using an improvised melee weapon. Unarmed opponents are flat-footed against any attacks you make with an improvised melee weapon.
normal: You take a –4 penalty on attack rolls made with an improvised weapon.
staminaText: When making an attack with an improvised weapon against an armed opponent, you can spend 5 stamina points. If you do, the target is considered flat-footed during that attack. An opponent who recognizes you and has seen you use Catch Off-Guard in this way is immune to this effect.
mythicText: In your hands, anything is a deadly weapon.
mythicBenefit: The damage dealt when you use improvised weapons increases by your tier. You also gain a bonus to CMD equal to your tier when an opponent attempts to sunder or disarm an improvised weapon you’re wielding.
text_zh: 你的敌人惊讶于你能熟练使用各种非常规武器和临时武器。
benefit_zh: 在你使用临时武器进行近战攻击时不会受到任何惩罚。未武装的敌人对于你的临时近战武器攻击视为措手不及。
normal_zh: 当你使用临时武器时在攻击检定时受到-4的减值。
mythicText_zh: 在你的手中，万物皆为兵刃。
mythicBenefit_zh: 当你使用临时武器（improvised weapons）时造成的伤害增加，增加数值等同于你的阶层。在对抗敌人对你所持握的临时武器所进行的击破武器或卸除武器尝试时，你的CMD获得等同于你的阶层的加值。
staminaText_zh: 在以临时武器攻击手持武器的敌人时，你可以花费5点耐力令目标对此次攻击呈措手不及状态。如果目标认出你并目睹你使用过随手武器能力，该战策无效。
